meanings.definition: To chart again or make a new chart of
meanings.sent1: She recharts the path to the park every morning.
meanings.sent2: The sailor recharts the ocean currents for the upcoming voyage.
meanings.sent3: Tom accidentally recharts his route and ends up at the wrong house.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed recharts her destiny towards greatness.
meanings.sent5: The artist meticulously recharts the details of the landscape painting.

meanings.definition: To plot a new course or direction on a map or chart
meanings.sent1: The captain recharts the ship's course to avoid the storm.
meanings.sent2: After receiving new information, she recharts the hiking trail on the map.
meanings.sent3: The students playfully recharts their imaginary journey to Candy Land.
meanings.sent4: His innovative thinking recharts the company's path to success.
meanings.sent5: The explorer bravely recharts the uncharted territories on the map.
